cast.overview: In order to help bring Nazis to justice, U.S. government agent T.R. Devlin recruits Alicia Huberman, the American daughter of a convicted German war criminal, as a spy. As they begin to fall for one another, Alicia is instructed to win the affections of Alexander Sebastian, a Nazi hiding out in Brazil. When Sebastian becomes serious about his relationship with Alicia, the stakes get higher, and Devlin must watch her slip further undercover.
cast.title: Notorious

details.biography: Leopoldine Konstantin was an Austrian stage and screen actress. She made her debut in the Deutsches Theater in Berlin in 1907 in Frank Wedekind's Spring Awakening (1907), and Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet (1907).
details.name: Leopoldine Konstantin
details.place_of_birth: Brünn, Moravia, Austria-Hungary [now Brno, Czech Republic]
